name: Ohana SMS Demo
description:
Ohana SMS is a Ruby on Rails application that allows people in need who lack
access to the internet to find human services via SMS.

SECRET_KEY_BASE.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies.

WEB_CONCURRENCY.description: The number of Puma workers to run.

MAX_THREADS.description: The number of Puma threads to run.
